text.div:
MeasureSourcePush

These are the requirements of a Measure Source actor implementing the push option

ModeCLIENT
DescriptionThe Measure Source Actor reports results for a single facility, collection of facilities or aggregated data for a region. In a single facility, or organization, the Measure Source Actor will compile data directly from the facility or organization source systems. A Measure Source may also exist in an Aggregator, Intermediary or Bridging role. In this guide we will use the term Intermediary to describe these roles. A Measure Source provides the FHIR data that is used by a Measure Consumer. A Measure Source implementing the Push Option periodically sends updates to a Measure Consumer using the Produce Measure transaction.

rest.documentation:
The Measure Source Actor reports results for a single facility, collection of facilities or aggregated data for a region.
In a single facility, or organization, the Measure Source Actor will compile data directly from the facility or organization source systems.
A Measure Source may also exist in an Aggregator, Intermediary or Bridging role. In this guide we will use the term Intermediary to describe these roles.
A Measure Source provides the FHIR data that is used by a Measure Consumer.
A Measure Source implementing the Push Option periodically sends updates to a Measure Consumer using the Produce Measure transaction.
